item.description:
Event Details
Student Athlete's Rising (STARS) Fundraiser

Join the STARS team of volunteers, coaches, mentors, and directors at Lir on Boylston Street for an evening of socializing for a cause! Grab a drink, munch on hors d'eoveurs, and meet the staff to ensure many more successful seasons and continued growth of our neighborhood program.

Student Athletes Rising is a nonprofit, youth development organization offering guidance and training for Boston's young people, ages 8 to 19. STARS uses team sports as a means to help youth work together to develop skills around coping and resolving conflicts and to lead healthier lives through an integrated program of athletics, nutrition and education. The goal for STARS is to provide young people with the knowledge and tools to live healthier lifestyles.

Students will benefit from support with leadership, education, planning and personal balance with a primary focus on:

•Education
•Health & Wellness
•Self-Esteem Building
•Athletic Training
•Teamwork
•Life Planning Techniques (Mentoring)

Cost: $20 Donation at the door or in advance (click here -> http://studentathlete... )
item.name: Student Athletes Rising (STARS) Nonprofit Fundraiser at Lir 11/2 @6pm
